SPA Presidium decree promulgated
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea promulgated a decree Monday on placing Kaephung and Jangphung counties under the jurisdiction of North Hwanghae Province.
 According to the decree, the two counties will belong to North Hwanghae Province and the DPRK cabinet take practical measures to execute the decree.

articles.title: Preparatory comm. for grand festival for national reunification formed in China
articles.content:
Preparatory comm. for grand festival for national reunification formed in China
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Koreans in China inaugurated a preparatory committee of the General Association of Koreans in China for a grand festival for national reunification to mark the third anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration in Shenyang, China on May 28.
 Yang Yong Dong, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce the undying revolutionary feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the national reunification movement and hold colorful functions such as a meeting, seminar, photo exhibition and film show in the period of the festival.
